column6: You are working in a team to design an energy proposal for a city. Now your goal is to choose from 4 different plans. Plan 1 highlights Coal energy. Plan 2 highlights Wind energy. Plan 3 highlights Nuclear energy. Plan 4 highlights Hydroelectric energy. Please discuss with the relative merits and demerits of each plan with your team.
column7: You are working in a team to design an energy proposal for a city. Now your goal is to choose from 4 different plans. Plan 1 highlights Coal energy. Plan 2 highlights Wind energy. Plan 3 highlights Nuclear energy. Plan 4 highlights Hydroelectric energy. Please discuss with the relative merits and demerits of each plan with your team.

column6: Hey xx, can you elaborate on the reason you chose plan 1 from your perspective of what would be most environmentally friendly and with lowest startup costs ?
